articles.author: Sports Desk
articles.title: ‘Don’t compare Suryakumar Yadav with Sanju Samson, it doesn’t seem right: Kapil Dev - The Indian Express
articles.description: Surya has not scored a single run in the three-match ODI series against Australia in home conditions. Samson on the other hand has done well for India in the limited opportunities he was given.
articles.content: Former India skipper Kapil Dev said that Indian star batter Suryakumar Yadav should not be compared to wicketkeeper- batter Sanju Samson. The world cup winning captain also questioned that if Samson … [+2002 chars]
